name: Vantage
description:
Part of the Girls' Greatest Joy Anthology.

A kinetic visual novel originally made for the Global Game Jam (https://globalgamejam.org/2014/games/vantage).

Story

Kendall meets his childhood friend Darlene after ten years. But there's something about her that makes her not who she is.

Credits

Conceptualization, Story, UI Design, Programming, and Debugging
Benedict "Moonlight Bomber" Villariaza

Character Design and Sprites
Luz Mercado
